name: LE SSERAFIM
description: LE SSERAFIM is a powerful 4th generation girl group known for their fierce performances, bold concepts, and athletic choreography.

funFacts: Former IZ*ONE and HKT48 member
One of the most followed K-pop idols from Japan
Known for her gaming skills, especially in Overwatch
Has been in the industry since 2011
Her fans are called 'Sakura Trees'
members.bio: Sakura is a Japanese idol veteran who rose to fame in HKT48 before joining IZ*ONE through Produce 48. With over a decade of experience, she brings unmatched professionalism to LE SSERAFIM. She's known for her gaming streams and elegant presence.

funFacts: Former IZ*ONE member who placed 10th in Produce 48
Known for her 'killer' charisma on stage
Has a '4D' quirky personality off-stage
Her high notes are legendary
Youngest leader of a HYBE group
members.bio: Chaewon is LE SSERAFIM's leader and main vocalist. Despite her cute appearance, she's known for her fierce stage presence, earning the nickname 'Baby Demon.' Her powerful vocals and leadership skills have made her the heart of LE SSERAFIM.

funFacts: Born in Korea, raised in New York
Participated in Produce 48 but didn't make final lineup
Plays piano and writes songs
Known for her powerful, emotional vocals
Her original song 'Raise y_our glass' went viral
members.bio: Yunjin is a Korean-American vocalist who didn't make IZ*ONE but got a second chance with LE SSERAFIM. Her powerful vocals and songwriting skills have made her a standout. She's known for her confident personality and emotional performances.

funFacts: Trained as a professional ballerina for 15 years
Studied at Royal Ballet School in Netherlands
Known for her elegant, graceful movements
Had the shortest training period in the group
Her ballet background makes her dancing unique
members.bio: Kazuha is a former professional ballerina from Japan who trained at the prestigious Royal Ballet School. Her elegant movements and graceful presence set her apart in K-pop. Despite limited K-pop training, her dance background made her a natural fit.

funFacts: Youngest member, debuted at 15
Exceptionally athletic - excels at sports
Known for her 'cat-like' visuals and personality
Despite being youngest, very confident on stage
Her archery skills went viral on variety shows
members.bio: Eunchae is LE SSERAFIM's maknae who debuted at just 15 years old. Despite her young age, she's remarkably athletic and confident. Her cat-like visuals and playful personality have won over fans worldwide.

seo.title: LE SSERAFIM Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with FEARNOT
seo.description: Create your LE SSERAFIM name with Sakura, Chaewon, Yunjin, Kazuha & Eunchae! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean stage names. Perfect for FEARNOT fans.
